112.content:
It was 7:00 in the morning. Jamie was dead on his bed in his room, drooling on his pillow. He spent the whole night secretly awake, reading through his book. Jamie had a fascination with Cryptozoology and could not get enough of it, confident that he would be the first person to catch Bigfoot when he grew up.

The nine-year-old boy stirred only a little as his alarm clock went off. Jamie would have slept through it too, but it woke him up just enough to feel the clammy sensations in his diaper.

That's right. Jamie wore diapers. This was not uncommon in boys his age, or any age for that matter, as there was no such thing as potty-training. Everybody wore diapers. All Jamie wore to bed was his blue and white long-sleeved sweater and diaper, feeling the most comfortable without pajama pants despite the snow and ice-outside his window.

1121.content:
He made a tired glance at the alarm clock. 7:06. He thought about it for a moment and remembers that the Weatherman dictated that school would be canceled for the next couple of days and decided to sleep in. He turned on his other-side, having flipped the pillow under his head, and dozed back off to sleep.

In the hallway, a two-year-old girl with long, messy-blonde hair and wide-green eyes toddled into his room. The girl wore a pink sweater with a shooting star and a rainbow on it that flew past her wrists. Her feet were bare and below the waist she wore a white and pink diaper with a lineup of Disney princesses on the front. She grabbed at the end of her bed, pulling herself up with little effort as she swung her little legs on top. She giggled from her efforts until she made it to the top of the bed were she threw herself onto her big brother.

"Jamie!" she squealed.

"Go away Sophie. Its a snowday," he whined. He tucked his feet in closer to him, letting out a small stream off pee into his diaper as it warmed him up.

"Play play play play" she muttered as she climbed all over him, goading him into a game of 'King of the Mountain'. Losing his patience, he pulled himself into a sitting position and threw a pillow over her. She retaliated with the swing of one of Jamie's pillows (or tried to, given that it was almost as big as she was) and their squabble devolved into a pillow fight.

They laughed and played until Sophie stopped struggling. She squatted, making a deep face of concentration as the back of her diaper began to expand, filling her diaper with poop. Jamie got off the bed, making his way to the bathroom to brush his teeth.

11211.content:
After Jamie brushes his teeth, he and his sister go and get their diapers changed.

"Mom, me and Sophie need a change."

"Okay, go to the bathroom and climb on the changing table." she replies.

You enter your bathroom. Instead of a toilet, you simply have a large family-sized changing table big enough for even your mom and dad. You and Sophie easily fit together on the table. You both lie down and wait to be changed.

Your mother comes in with some powder, wipes and two fresh diapers. She's wearing a sweater and sweatpants, and you can see the bulge of her diaper underneath. She untapes your diaper, but right as she opens it you start to poop. She closes the diaper back up so you can finish messing. You hold it closed as you poop and pee a little more, and your mother goes to change your sister while you relieve yourself. After she opens your sister's diaper, Sophie starts to pee, right onto your mother's sweater.

"Sophie, that was my favorite sweater!" cries your mother, who removes her sweater after your sister finishes peeing on it. Sophie giggles, and your mother finishes changing you both in just her bra. After helping you two off the table, she messes her own diaper.

"Looks like I'm going to have to get my diaper changed by your dad now. Can you tell him to come change me while I put my sweater in the wash?"

"Okay, Mom." you answer.

Heading down the hall, Jamie sees his dad on the couch watching tv while eating a bowl of cereal, "Hey dad, moms messy and needs a change." Has said as he plopped down on the couch.

"Alright," he said, quickly drinking the milk in the bowl as he finished up and placed the bowl on the counter, "I'm going, I'm going." Jamie heard him say as he walked down the hall to the bathroom.

As Jamie changed the channels, looking for some cartoons, Sophie toddled into the living room and saw him, smiling, she climbed onto the couch, "Jamie play!" She said as she crawled over to him, quickly embracing him in a tight hug and trying to pull him toward her.

"Not yet, Sophie." Jamie said, looking down the hall, "Let me have my breakfasts first, then we'll play, alright?" He said, not really looking forward to it, but if it got her off his back for even a moment, it was worth it.

"Yay!" Sophie said, understanding what her brother said, toddling off to her pile of toys in the corner of the living room.

Eventually, he heard his mom coming down the hall, and he quickly got up and saw that, yes, she was topless, and she was heading to the couch, he'd get breastmilk! Like almost all kids until they were 17, a good part of his diet was breast milk, sure Sophie preferred baby food, and apple juice over their moms milk, but he preferred milk quite a bit. And with school cancelled for the next week or so, he'd be getting this kind of breakfast (and possibly lunch) every day!

"Alright Jamie, let's get your breakfast while your dad gets Sophie hers prepared." His mom said as she sat down on the couch, letting him rest his back on her lap and curl up slightly into the fetal position as he nursed. She wrapped her arms around him to hug him and support his head, not wanting him to pull too much at her nipples, it kind of saddened her that Sophie didn't enjoy getting breastfed, but at least one of her children wasn't growing up too soon.

As both Jamie and Pippa kept playing their game, Jamie's mother came by, her hands free for the moment.

"Hey Pippa, I didn't know you were here."

"Hello Mrs. Bennett," said Pippa, giving her a polite smile before returning to her game, only to find that Jamie beat her the second she wasn't looking.

"Wuh-hey!" said Pippa as she hit his arm. He laughed slightly.

"You snooze, you lose," he said, giving her a lop-sided grin. "Hey, are you hungry?"

"Yeah, I could go for something. What do you have?" Jamie got an idea.

"Hey mom, did Sophie drink all of it?"

"No, she prefers apple-juice, you know that," answered his mother.

"Can we have some?" He asked.

"Well... I guess so," he decided as she sat down on the couch and began to unbutton her shirt.

"Awesome," said Jamie as the two of them began to climb onto the couch. His mother removed her shirt, revealing the nursing bra she had on. He latched onto her left breast as he began to help himself to his mother's sweet milk. Pippa was less enthusiastic.

"Don't you want any?" Jamie's mother asked.

"Um, I don't know. I've never had any that wasn't my mom's," said Pippa.

"Come on Pippa, it tastes really good," said Jamie, licking the milk from his lips.

"Well... I guess it wouldn't hurt," she said as she began to latch onto his friend's mom. He was right. Her milk was sweet. Her own mom's milk was much plainer tasting, but was still delicious. Her nipple was different too. It was harder and darker (probably because she had two kids while Pippa was an only child) but released milk much quicker.

It was not uncommon for kids their age to drink breast-milk. Scientists state that it was much healthier for children than cows milk, promoted bonding between children and their mothers and nowadays children as old as 14 would breast-feed. Mrs. Bennett had her hands on their backs, rubbing them softly as the two relieved the pressure she felt on her breasts. Her hands wandered down to their diapers, checking for use.

1123.content:
"Jamie, your going to be late for school." That was his mother, and she was right. Jamie slunked lazily out of his bed, nearly falling down the stairs into his living room. He slapped himself on his right cheek a few times to wake himself up. "Morning mom."

His mother was behind the couch on her knees changing his little sister Sophie. The girl was nearly read for her day in preschool, wearing a pastel pink and yellow dress and pink shoes and socks. She was on her back, her mother replacing the wet diaper she had on with a fresh one.

"Hey Jamie. You need a change? You'll need to get into your uniform before the bus arrives." Jamie felt the front of his diaper. It was dry. He didn't mess it either. This usually meant that he would end up using his diaper soon enough anyway.

He quickly removed his shirt and tossed it into the nearby laundry hamper, leaving him wearing nothing but his diaper as he found one of his uniforms - freshly clean from the laundry - and a layer of winter clothes to wear over them to wear when he would traverse the chill outside.

What kind of school does Jamie attend.
1123.title: He's late for school!

11232.content:
Jamie dressed himself into his school uniform and put on his extra layer, consisting of a navy-blue coat, a pair of jeans, black and white mittens and a matching hat. He ran out the door with his backpack and the lunchbox his mother packed for him, blubbering out a "love you, good bye" to his mom and baby-sister. He made sure not to hurt himself on the way to the bus-stop, running on the neighbor's snow-covered lawn - following a path riddled with foot-steps from the other kids - rather than the sidewalk covered in ice. He made it to the bus-stop where his friends were waiting.

"Hey Jamie," said Pip. Pip was a long-time friend to Jamie, and could even be considered as Jamie's first crush (not that Jamie would admit it). With her were their friends Monty and Maurie, Tom, Claude and Cindy (or because of her "tough-gal" persona and being tallest of all of them, "Cindy-Slam"). They talked for a bit, Jamie and Tom sharing a pack of pop-tarts, as the bus finally arrived. The bus was a light, almost pastel shade of yellow, the side of the bus reading "Thaddeus Lolie Elementary School", with multicolored balloons and a bunny-rabbit painted on. The kids loaded up on the bus single-file as they each found themselves a seat. Each row contains two toddler seats with belt buckles and everything. Jamie takes a seat next to Tom, buckling himself in the seat and waiting out the ride. He felt urine squirt little by little into the padding of his diaper as the bus drove, but paid no mind to it, enjoying the warmth it provided him.

They arrive at the school, nearly slipping as they all ran into the building to escape the chill in the air. As the bell ran, signaling them to find their classrooms, Jamie and the rest of the group were talking amongst themselves until they arrived at Miss Meli's classroom, Jamie joined all of the other kids at the south wall to hang up their winter clothes and backpacks. Jamie took off his hat, gloves, jacket and even his pants, revealing the short-sleeved baby-blue onsie underneath, the bulk of his diaper obvious to anyone that saw him, the only other thing he was wearing being his shoes and socks. The onsie had button snaps near the neck to allow an easy way to remove it if he needed to, and button snaps at the very bottom to allow easy diaper changing. This was the school's uniform for boys, the girl's uniforms being similar except for their pink color and having a short, almost transparent skirt that did nothing to hid the diapered groin beneath the onsie.

Class did not officially start yet, allowing kids who needed changing to get changed by the teacher or to make it to their seats and relax before class started.

115111.content:
As Fin sits in between his mother and father on the plane, he can't help but shiver as he grips the armrest of his seat. His mother, Ashley consoles him, placing her hand over his.

"It'll be alright. Just relax. Try to keep an open mind and think of your future, okay?"

Fin stares at his mother, a beautiful blonde woman that looks ten years younger than her age with a moderate bust. She keeps her hair long and smooth and certainly has a way with keeping up with her skin. Her warm smile doesn't at all provide you any sense of comfort though.

"T-this is...weird though. I...I could have taken a job and paid for a school somewhere else. We didn't have to-"

"Fin," Ashley interrupts with a firm voice, then sighs, "...we've been over this and it's too late to turn back now. You know as well as I do that this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Three years and that's it. Besides, it can't be that bad?"

Fin can't help but grow irritated and grit his teeth. "N-not bad? Are you serious? Mom, I have to be a Baby for three years while wearing a diaper. I don't need you or dad to take care of me!"

Ashley could understand as she bit her lips, although part of her was a little saddened. "I understand that. Still, it's not as if they're asking you to be half-naked or use the diaper like a baby..."

Fin narrows his eyes. "Really? How about the clause where either you or Dad has to accompany me to classes everyday or hire a nanny? What is the point of that!"

Ashley turns around to look at the other passengers, then motions her hands to lower her son's voice. "Sweetie, just be calm okay? There's still a lot of things we don't understand. Once we talk with the immigration officer and your advisors, I'm sure that it won't be as bad as you think it is. They want students from other countries to join their school, not be turned away from it."

That would be a logical excuse, but the supposed information you gathered from the internet hasn't been promising. That said, a lot of information on Babiweena is skewed to some degree. The country is one the least easily understood lands in the world.

For now, Fin turns away from his mother and sighs, turning to watch the window view of the clouds outside the plan. His father is sound asleep with his brown combed hair, chiseled beard, and slightly dark complexion. He was far more agreeable to this move when he found out his son had been accepted with a full scholarship.

To be fair though, the fault of Fin's current position lies with himself. He could remember applying to the university among others just as a joke, not excepting he'd get accepted. He knew that it's one of the most prestigious universities in the world.

She was laying on her back, sucking on a baby-bottle filled with a glowing blue elixir of her own concoction. While she was enjoying the taste of her formula, her golem was spending his time changing her messy diaper.

You see, Mimsy was a Sorceress that worked for the Church of Rebirth. The Church of Rebirth is one the world's most influential religious institutions in the world. The church believed that the world was a womb, and that after death, adulthood would be achieved. Because of this, the church (an its followers) believe that humanity is a race of a babies needing to be taught adulthood, thus they spend their whole lives as babies. They identify as babies, they dress like babies, some even live a baby-like lifestyle. As a Church of Rebirth Sorceress, not only is Mimsy dedicated to this lifestyle, but she also has access to ancient magics that the Church cultivated over the years. Using this magic, Mimsy crafted her own butler, assistant and daddy out of Church-sanctioned play-do, created a golem that tends to all of her needs.

Mimsy felt a comforting warmth spike through her body as she drank her nutritional elixir in contrast to the cold wet-wipe that swept over Mimsy's diaper area. The Golem balled up the messy diaper and the wipes that went into cleaning his master and placed a new one under her. She powdered her and taped the diaper back up as Mimsy finished her bottle. As soon as it was heated, she removed the potion using a pair of chemistry-lab forceps (colored pink, since it was her favorite color) and poured a conservative amount onto the soiled diaper. The potion ate through it like acid, the diaper and waste inside, foaming into a sky-blue collection of bubbles. Grass and flowers and mushrooms rapidly grew from the foam.

"YES, IT WORKED!!!" She cried out. She jumped out of her seat and bounced on the balls of her heels, giggling insanely before she hugged her golem spontaneously. The Golem hugged her back, his playmate programming kicking in before she ran back to the new life on the platter.

For weeks she has been working on a means to improve agriculture in the country. It took much trial and error for her to perfect the blue elixir. There were huge stuffed building blocks the size of buildings, clouds that looked and moved exactly like bunny rabbits and giraffes and kittens, trees with toys and stuffed animals hanging from their branches, and large, soft, spongy, hills looked fun to bounce on. It looked like as if God baby-proofed the planet Earth. (*Note: Picture the Primary Village from Digimon Adventure)

He heard laughter fill the air. He looked to his left and saw a castle or cathedral, the sand-colored-stone building clashing with the landscape. He saw children of varying ages. Toddlers crawling on the ground, to two year olds toddling with teddy bears, to even kids his own ages playing tag in complete bliss. What confused him was that all of them, no matter their age, wore baby clothes proportional to them. They all also wore diapers. It was obvious that they wore diapers and they acted like it was normal.

A girl with a ponytail wearing a pink onsie stopped running and looked to Daniel. She waved Hello to him, smiling widely. Daniel almost waved back, only to remember that he was completely naked, cupping his crotch and crossing his legs, blushing horribly. The girl did not seem to notice his discomfort and went back to playing with her friends.

He looked to her right, only to find two nuns materializing to his right. They looked like nuns, but they did not appear to be human. They're skin was pale, tinted similar to stone, their skin flawless like a sculpture. They wore nun habits and black robes that parted their bodies, revealing that they wore absolutely nothing underneath. Their eyes were pale, almost like a blind person's eyes, though they could clearly see just fine. One of the nuns got on her knees, placing her hands on both of his shoulders.

"H-Hey, what are you--" but his mind went blank as she kissed him on the forehead, his whole body relaxing and his mind becoming cloudy once her blue-lips touched his skin, almost like a sudden shock of electricity.

The nun reached behind him and effortlessly picked him up, sitting on her forearm as she carried him to the cathedral. He laid his head against her shoulder, his mind still a-drift.

He was placed on a matt against the wall next to the door, as the nun reached a cubboard attached to the wall. The nun reached into the cabinet and took out a diaper. It was the size of an adult diaper, but completely decorated and designed like a baby's disposable diaper. Daniel wanted to protest, but his limbs were like jelly. She lifted his legs, unwrapping the diaper underneath him. She pulled it between his legs and taped the straps into place. She reached back to the cupboard and pulled out a baby-blue t-shirt, pulling it over his head and adjusting him arms.

She stood back almost like she was admiring her work as Daniel regained control of is limbs again and his head cleared up. He sat up, confused and appalled by what just happened to him. He quickly got on his feet and stared at the two nuns.

"What the Hell?" Daniel yelled. "I'm not a baby! I demand for some real clothes and some answers now!"

The nuns did not seem to notice his distress and smiled, making a silent gesture to the other children.

"Play play play play!" It was Sophie, now awake and was happy to see Carrie. The two-year-old was a fast-crawler, immediately climbing all over Carrie, who was laughing with her. They really were babies; no troubles to trouble them. All was well for them.
132212212222.title: Decide to play with Carrie and Sophie

13222.content:
Kristy. Kristy Cotton. Age 16. These were the first details that came to her. She felt like she was hit by a truck. In-fact, she was. Hit hard. The last thing she remembered was when she was driving with her friend Carrie when suddenly a pick-up truck struck their car. Before she felt the impact, everything went black.

When she woke up, she found herself in...

132221.title: A Heavenly World of Powder and Baby-wipes

choices: She finds Carrie on the other side
She explores this strange place of babes of all shapes and sizes.
1322211.content:
Kirsty felt like she was floating through water. Warm water that soothed her body, loosening all knots and discomfort in her limbs and back and head. She shifted on the surface she was lying on - the ground like lying on a mix of fresh, pillowy bubbles - as a soft light peeked through her closed eyelids. The feeling of the ground on her arms and legs caused great pleasure to move through her body, as if her sense of touch was heightened to the nth degree.

She opened her eyes and she saw a rainbow. The entire sky was a spectrum of rainbow from the calming night of dark violet all the way to a piercing white of the sun rising from the horizon, every star, every nebula, every cosmic phenomenon in the universe painted the sky. She could see every detail, as if she was looking at an Astronomy magazine, only even better.

She pushed herself upward until she was sitting up. Reality itself was more intense, more real looking both in the beautiful sky to the near endless clouds (you heard me, clouds) that was the ground. She brushed her hand against the cloud, feeling the cozy, almost cottony feeling it gave her. That when she noticed something was off.

"Hold on, what the fuck am I wearing?!" She shouted. She inspected her clothes and was horrified at what she was looking at. Instead of the spring-green flip-flops and skinny jeans she could have sworn that she was wearing, she instead wore an incredibly puffy pair of bloomers that hugged her waist, her two, smooth bare-feet sprouting from the frilly openings. She wore a frilly, short-sleeved sundress instead of her tight-fitting spagetti-string green shirt, with a frilly bonnet-like bib strapped around her neck and covering the sundress. She tried to push her legs together. Not only could she not close them completely, her underwear getting in the way, but her underwear made a noticable crinkling sound.

"Oh no..." She was not wearing panties. Beneath the bloomers, she was wearing a diaper. "Oh no, oh no!" She tried pushing the bloomers down to get a better look, but failed. The bloomers were a part of the shirt. She quickly got in her feet, the soles of her feet tingling from the clouds, and she continued to try and pull at her clothes trying to remove the baby clothes that she woke-up with but she could not. There were no openings, not zippers or buttons or anything that will let her take the clothes off.

Suddenly, she heard something open. It sounded huge and ancient, something that was made to open at that time specifically for her. She looked and saw a golden gate, its bars that glimmer from the light shining behind it, opening to allow more light to escape. Kirsty blocked her eyes, unable to handle the sudden flash of light assaulting her.
1322211.title: A Nursery amongst the clouds beyond pearly gates.

choices: The boy joins her through a strange world of wonder.
13222112.content:
When Kristy's eyes adjusted to the sudden daylight. An island stood before her. Or at least that was the only word she could use to describe it. It was like a giant island in the clouds. There were mountains and trees and rivers and birds of every shape and color flying across the landscape all held onto this landmass amongst the clouds.

As she stepped through the border, awestruck, she felt a sudden breeze, almost as if a door slammed behind her. She looked back suddenly, seeing nothing but another mountain but with a large, keyhole-like mark carved into it.

"What the fuck," cursed Kristy.

She felt the rock wall behind her, trying to figure to what was happening.

Chrick. Chrick.

Kristy looked to her right and she could not believe what she saw.

There was a boy laying on his back on a smooth, marble slab. He looked like he was maybe a year or two younger than Kristy, but you would not believe such a thing if you were to look at him first glance. He was wearing a baby-blue t-shirt one size two-tiny on him. He was sucking on a tall baby bottle half-filled with juice as what Kristy could only describe as a cloaked, female statue was wiping his butt, his cheeks smeared with poop with a messy diaper moved to the side. The boy was completely okay with this by the look on his face.

The statue reached for an opening under the table, revealing a replacement diaper. She placed it under him, powdering him and taping it up again. The boy got back up, leaving his now empty bottle next to the balled-up, soiled garment as the statue gave him a curtsey.

"Hello", said the boy, just now noticing her.

Still shocked by what she just witnessed, Kristy did not reply.

"Are you okay?" He asked, confused.

"What the fuck just happened?!"

"Ooh, you just said a bad word," the boy teased, talking like a five-year-old.

"Bad word? YOUR WEARING A DIAPER!"

"So are you," he said.

"No I'm not, I-- hold on, what the fuck am I wearing?!" She shouted. She inspected her clothes and was horrified at what she was looking at. She was not in her green shirt and skinny-jeans She was in a big, pink sundress. A sundress a baby might wear if that baby was the size of a teenager. Even worse, she was wearing a diaper! A diaper the dress failed to cover-up in the slightest.

"What the fuck!"

"That should make it easier when you pee or poop," said the boy almost as if it was a wise thing to say.

"YOU SHIT IN YOUR DIAPER, NOT ME!"

"Why not? Isn't that what they're for?"

Kristy wanted to tell him 'no' defiantly, but she couldn't argue with that, so she decided to drop it.

"Where are we?"

"I dunno," he said. Kristy pinched between her eyes.

"Look, the last thing I can remember I was in a car with my friend…" that was when she remembered. "Wait, were's Carrie?"

"Who?" Asked the boy. Kristy noticed that the poopy diaper, empty bottle and the statue woman behind the boy vanished into thin air. She decided not to ponder on it.

"I need to find my friend, I'll catch up with you later," said Kirsty, deciding not to bother.
13222112.title: She explores this strange place of babes of all...

1323.title: Who goes to the Diaper Dream-realm?

13231.content:
Steven was screaming in what he could only describe was a giant tube slide one would find at a child's playground or at a waerpark. Most tube-slides were fairly large enough to allow a grade-school child to slide down in and were usually in only one color. The tube-slide Steven was in however was large enough to fit a large car through, and it sparkled in various, impossible colors like a living, glittering rainbow.

Another strange thing was that Steven was completely naked. He tried to cover himself, but the sheer friction and slipperiness combined with the gravity weighing down on him as he slid at high speeds made doing such a thing impossible. Unlike most tube-slides, the slide he was currently in had no notched or bolts keeping it together, almost as if it was one massive component. The friction did not feel ruff on his bare-skin, almost as if the entire ride was lubricated by something. If he didn't know any better, the smell in the air would have told him that the slide was lubed with baby oil.

He could not remember what happened or why he was even there. In fact, he could not remember what he was even doing before realizing he was in this strange slide-like apparatus.

As he slid down the slide, he saw a small light source coming up ahead.
13231.title: The Slide of Destiny

choices: They meet someone/something there at the beach.
132311.content:
When he finally reached the end of the strange slide, he felt his stomach drop as he found himself falling in a large body of water. He struggled to swim, trying to reach the surface until he found his footing on a shallow part of the water.

He crawled onto the beach, coughing up what felt like many gallons of water before collapsing from exhaustion. His vision became blurry as he looked up at the sun as a silhouetted figure came into view before he passed out

When Steven regained consciousness, he could barely make out a singing voice ringing in his ears. He rubbed his eyes, trying to wake himself back up as he tried to keep the blinding light of the sun out of his eyes.

"Uh, what happened?"

"Oh good. You're awake!"

Steven opened his eyes to see an adult woman with shiny brown hair smiling back at him. She wore what he could only describe as some kind of nurse's outfit, but the colors were incredibly juvenile shades of blue and pink, almost like a fetish outfit or an anime costume.

"Where am I?"

"You're in the Infant's Dream," she said in a chipper tone.

"The what?"

It was then that Steven realized that he was no longer naked, but he was not in his usual clothes either. His shirt was too soft, and the sleeves were incredibly tiny on him. It was in a very light blue color with a small duckling illustrated on the front, but that was not the worst of it. The only other thing he was wearing was what he would only describe was a fully proportional sky-blue baby diaper, with an illustration of baby blocks that spelled out "Baby-Boy" on the front of it.

"WHAT THE HELL AM I WEARING!"

"Well we couldn't have you running around with your cute little tush and pee-pee exposed, couldn't we?"

Steven had a hard time believing what was happening. This woman was talking to him like he was an actual baby.

"I'm not a baby! Why am I not wearing actual clothes."

"Of course your a baby, silly. You were just born a few minutes ago. Look," as she pointed to the lake. That was when he saw the world clearly.

The lake itself did not look an actually lake. The water was far to clean, almost like it was a pool. Instead of a rocky or sandy shore, the shore was blue and plastic with duck illustrations, almost like it was one giant kiddy-pool. A few feet away from the water, there was clear cut-off by a tiny wood fence that kept in light brown sand, the sandy part of the beach littered with tiny little plastic shovels and toy pick-up trucks like a giant sandbox.

"You came from the Broken Water," she said, gesturing to the lake. "All babies come from the Broken Water."

It's official, Steven thought. This woman is crazy.

"Who did you say you were again?"

"My name is Judy, but you can call me Mama Judy or just Mommy if you want."

"…yeah, I don't want to know why you kidnapped me exactly but I'm going to find you a doctor and myself a phone before you start doing anything worse. Where did you put my clothes?"

"You weren't born with any clothes, silly-billy. That' s why they call it a birthday suit."

"Right, right… well, do you have anything else I can wear?"

Judy was practically dancing in excitement as she reached on the ground a picked up a large blue and pink messenger bag. She opened the bag and revealed the contents. Three rather large stacks of fresh, unused diapers, boxes of baby-wipes, baby-powder, baby oil, pacifiers, baby bottles with with milk and clothes of varying shapes and colors were all stuffed inside the bag. Steven skin paled and his throat went dry at what he was seeing, realizing that it was all meant for him.

"I just thought that this would be the cutest thing for you to wear," as she help up a pair of overalls with a cutesy t-rex symbol on the front in just his size.

Steven looked down at what he was wearing now, horrified at the idea of somebody seeing a 15 year-old boy like him walking around exposed in a giant diaper out in public, and the overalls were probably the least babyish clothes he could think of given the options.

"Fine."
132311.title: The Broken Water

1323111.content:
The Infant's Dream had a a strange and juvenile atmosphere to it. He wasn't sure if it was the perpetual smell of vanilla and baby power, the clouds that always formed cutesy bear-cubs or tiger-kittens, the way the water sparkled like crystal or the fact that he had to waddle as he walked, since the diaper he had to wear kept his legs apart as it crinkled. His body was covered in the "cute" (as Judy put it) overalls but he was not able to convince Judy remove the diaper. He tried removing it himself, but every time he tried, his mind went blank. He could not understand why, but he just couldn't figure how to get it off. He knew that the diaper was held on by the tapes on the side, but overtime he went for them, he instantly forgot how. it was weird.

The crinkling noise was obnoxious. Judy was obnoxious. Judy, with her constant dotting and hovering and baby-talking and…

"Guh!" Steven grunted in frustration. "Why won't you leave me alone?!"

"Because sweetie," said Judy. "I can't just leave my baby unsupervised. That would make me a bad mommy."

"Would you stop talking to me like that? I am not 'your baby', and you are not my mother!"

RRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAOOOOOOORRR!!!!!!!

"What the hell was that?!" Asked Steven.
1323111.title: They explore the forest.

1323112.content:
Steven struggles to walk, his legs like jelly, the same tingling sensation one has after a long day of swimming. He toddles around like a toddler, embarrassed by his dress. He has tried to pry the diaper off of his frame, but all attempts have been in vain. It was as if the diaper was super-glued together and soldered to his waist. He tried to get Judy to take it off, but she refused, claiming that he "needed it."

As his legs gave out, Judy wrapped her arms around his waist, preventing him from falling. She was surprisingly strong, as she was able to lift him from beneath his arms off of the ground without any sign of struggle.

"Woopsy daisies," said Judy as she placed her forearm under his diapered bottom, holding him in a sitting position as if he really was a baby. "We can walksies later when you have your strength back.

"Hey, I can walk by myself. Put me down!"

"Why so cranky little baby? Are you hungry?"

"Stop talking like that! I am not a baby!"

Judy reached int the diaper bag, oblivious to Steven's struggling, as she pulled out what looked like a large baby bottle full of milk. He tried to keep it away from him, even trying to push the woman's arm away from him, only for the herculean woman to succeed to put the bottle's nipple in his mouth. He instinctively started sucking on the bottle, unable to help himself as the strange white formula to gush into his mouth. It was a strange, alien taste, the closest he could compare it to being roses and cow-milk. His stomach felt like it was straining, the drink strangely filling. Just as the bottle was completely empty, someone(thing) arrived from the forest.
1323112.title: They meet someone/something there at the beach.

13231121.content: What gender is the baby?
13231121.title: A "baby" with their own nurse.

132311211.content: What gender is the nurse?
132311211.title: Girl

choices: He waits for Ahsley to finished getting changed.
1323112111.content:
From the trees walked what looked like a male Judy. His hair was short, clothed in a male nurses outfit in the same color as Judy's clothes. He was pushing a large, white stroller with pink ornate patterns decorating it. The stroller had two seats, one was empty while the other had a 14-year old girl, nearly Steven's age. Her hair was dark brown woven into twin pigtails with a cutesy pink butterfly clip. She wore a light-pink sundress with a kitten illustration woven on her chest, the dress doing nothing to hide the proportional diaper she was wearing, which so happened to have a large yellow stain on the front. She was sucking on a pink pacifier, seemingly content.

"Hello Judy," said the male nurse.

"Jefferson, it's nice to see you," Steven's nurse responded. "Hello wittle Ashley."

The "baby" girl did not respond, simply sucking on her pacifier as she kept her eyes on Steven.

"Who's this little cutey?" Jefferson asked.

"This is my new baby Steven. He just came from the broken water and I just had him fed.

"Aw," he cooed affectionately as he ruffled Steven's hair. Steven tried to bat him away.

"Stop that!" Steven shouted.

"He's just a little cranky and he just needs his nap," said Judy.

"I do not! I want you to put me down and get me out of these fucking baby clothes now!"

"Well if you need help I have an extra seat for him right here," Jefferson referencing the empty seat in the stroller. "It always lulls Ashley right to sleep."

"I think I'll take you up on that offer." Judy then placed the boy in the the empty seat, buckling him into the seat. Judy then went behind the stroller, helping Jefferson push the stroller as they went into their own conversation. Ashley removed the pacifier in her mouth.

"Hi," she said, twirling one of her pigtails in her hand.

"...hi?" Steven responded confused.

"Steven, right? I'm Ashley."

Steven was at a loss. She was being just as casual about the situation as the nurses were.

"...what is going on?" Steven asked, not in the mood for banter.

"We're in a stroller on a walk."

Steven pinched between her eyes.

"No, I mean where are we and why are we dressed like babies?!"

"Oh, okay, I see what you mean. We're in the Infant's Dream."

"And that is?"

"We're visiting this dream world where all visitors are babied."

"That's it?"

"That's all I really know."

"How long have you been here?" He asked.

"Hmmm... a week I think," said Ashley.

"A week?! You've been dressed like that for an entire week?"

"Yeah."

"And your cool with that?"

"You get used to it really quickly," she answered.

"How long are we going to be here, and why can't I remember coming here."

"I don't know how I got here, but from what I remember, all of the visitors stay for at least a month before they're sent back."

"A month?! You mean I'm going to be stuck here for a month?"

"Uh oh, looks like someone needs a change," said Jefferson suddenly.

"Could you hold that thought for a second?" Asked Ashley as she put her pacifier back into her mouth. Jefferson unbuckled the seat-belt strapping her down as she reached under her arms and lifted her out of the seat. She curled her legs, making it easier for Jefferson to prop her up, carrying her. Judy reached into the diaper bag he was carrying and laid out what must have been a changing-mat. Ashley gave no resistance as she let him unstrap and replace her diaper, content as a toddler.

I got to get out of here! Steven thought to himself.
1323112111.title: Sharing a Stroller

choices: They are strolled around the forest, exploring the Infant's Dream.
They enter a village entirely populated by "babies" and nurses.
13231121111.content:
Steven starts to panic, realizing that he was in the same boat (or stroller, in this case). He was being babied by an anonymous stranger just as she was. Now she lets him do whatever he wants with her, and then he'll be next. He struggled as hard as he could, tugging at the buckle that kept him tied to the stroller in a vein effort to escape, but to no avail. The buckle just would not unbuckle for him.

He felt his whole body tense. He thought it was the sound of the girl's diaper ruffling as her nurse undid it, but he quickly realized that the tensity was not actually coming from Ashley. It was coming from a strange cringy sensation moving through his body downward. Uh oh.

No no no no no NO! This can't be happening, he thought to himself. He struggled in his seat, trying to get out of his seat.

"Hey lady!"

"Yes sweetie?" Ask Judy.

"Could you get me out of here? I need to use the bathroom, real bad!"

"You need to go potty? That's okay Steven. You can go in your cute little diaper and mommy will clean you after," said Judy in her usual, babying tone. This women was obviously insane.

"Dammit woman, I'm not playing with you. I need to go real bad and I need to use a po-BATHROOM!" He caught himself, almost saying 'potty'. What the hell?

"I'm your mommy, and your my baby. It's my job and duty as your mommy to clean up after my wittle baby boy." He poked as his stomach as Steven suddenly lurched forward. Without warning, he felt an icky mess ooze into his seat, feeling the hot, goopy mess spread under his butt. He tried to clench it, struggling to stop the flow pouring in his diaper, only to feel a hot stream of pee enter the front of his diaper instead. He had no muscle control just like a baby, and this terrified him.

A fifteen-year-old boy just entering high school just took a dump in his pants. He kept his body still, both out of shock and as a way to keep the poop from spreading.

"Aw, you all done sweetie?" Asked Judy.

"Shut up and die," Steven muttered under his own breath, shortened by the smell of his own waste.

"Come on baby boy. Let's get you cleaned up," said Judy. The nurse picked him up, unbothered by his weight, size and the load in his diaper. Her arm supported his bottom, spreading the mess in his diaper as he tried to keep his balance in her arms. He saw the male nurse put Ashley back into her seat, strapping the freshly-changed girl into the stroller as she sucked on her pacifier, content.

Judy placed him on the same changing mat, Judy unbuckling the straps on his overalls as she effortlessly removed his clothes, leaving him in his t-shirt and soiled diaper. To his shock, she effortlessly untaped the diaper, something he tried and failed to do earlier. As she opened up the front of his diaper, Steven covered his own face with his hands, mortified and horrified by what was happening. He could practically feel Ashley staring at him as he felt Judy wipe the poop from his butt with a cold wet-wipe. The change felt like it took forever, feeling the powder being rubbed over his now-hairless groin, until she strapped a fresh diaper over him.

"There you go baby boy. All nice and clean," cooed Judy. She pulled his hands out of his face as she peppered Steven's face with kisses.

"Such a well-behaved little boy, isn't he?" Said Jefferson.

"He's my little angel," said Judy as she picked up Steven - leaving him in nothing but a shirt in a diaper after putting the overalls back into the diaper bag - as she placed him back into the stroller. He looked to his bare-feet, ashamed of himself as he tried not to look at the girl sitting next to him.

"You get used to it," he assumed Ashley said, her words muffled behind her pacifier.
13231121111.title: He tries to escape.

13231121112.content:
Steven tried not to stare, but his teenage hormones were driving him crazy. Here was a girl around his age naked from the waist down laying right there across from him, completely content as her juvenile underwear was being traded, revealing her hairless private area. He never saw women parts in person before, so it was especially hard for him to keep his head on. Trying to distract himself, his hands made it to the seat-belt that kept him in the large stroller, pushing the buckle in hopes that it would come loose, but it was completely locked in place, not willing to unbuckle for him. Jefferson balled up the used diaper with the wipes used to clean the girl as the girl helped herself to her feet, her legs parted slightly from the poofy fibers of her diaper. She removed the pacifier that she kept in her mouth during her diaper change as she calmly walked back to the stroller and sat back into her seat.

"Okay, so where were we?"

Steven did a double take. She treated getting a diaper change like she just sneezed or something. This was especially awkward considering that beneath his poofy diaper and overalls hid an erection.

"Your just... okay with a grown man stripping you naked and touching you like that?"

"Well sure. Ever wore a wet diaper after it's cooled off? It's icky."

Again, Steven double-taked.

133.title: Sci-fi Planets and beyond

choices: ...a Nursery Facility where he meets other "Babies".

1331.content:
It is the nursery planet Clononinon. The sky is dark, thunder pounding in the distance. The barren canyons laced with chrome machinery like a cross between a city and a countryside, but completely composed of machinery. All of this machinery was built for a single, solitary purpose: to breed and care for humanity. (*Picture the dystopian world of The Matrix, but the robots aren't hostile to the humans they breed)

You see, after millions of years of experimentation and exposure to their own waste products, humanity's genes became polluted and inbred. In order to clean and perfect their race, Earth's scientists created an intricate nursery system on a planet they have purchased many years ago. Their, they worked and perfected their cloning technology, artificially perfecting their genetic material in their next generation.

In "Incubating Facility B123.AD", a nursing bot did its daily maintenance, its various metallic tentacles typing in coding to be uploaded into the various unborn humans in the room. Along the walls held very large pods. In these transparent pods held orange and pink amniotic fluid filled with nutrient, each holding an unborn human being. Some ranged in size, some holding children as young as one years old, to some as old as 18 years old. One pod in particular was ready.

The nursing robot floated in front of a pod labeled "Baby #30009485: DENNIS". In the pod floated a male human that one would register as being 18, completely hairless with a small umbilical cord and placenta absorbing nutrients from the fluids he is floating in. The Nursing robot's many eyes switched and blinked, observing the label and the data it presenting to it, telling it that Baby #30009485 has reached the end of its incubation period.

The Nursing Robot plugged one of its tentacles into a socket below the label, uploading commons into the system. The soft underbelly of the pod began to tremble, before suddenly the synthetic tissue instantly broke. The amniotic fluid flooded out on the pod where it drained through the floor, leaving Dennis on his back, dazed and sticky from the fluid, his soft-skinned limbs twitched, his eyes drowsy and sensitive.

The Nursery Robot observed the "baby" boy for a few second before one of its tentacle grabbed the umbilical cords and swiftly cut it right off. Dennis squirmed a little from the sudden sensation, and before he could cry out, another tentacle from the robot popped into his mouth, the nipple as the tip pumping a nutritional formula into his mouth where he sucked on it greedily. As Dennis' attention was occupied, the Nursery Robot used three of its other tentacles to tend to his other needs. It applied a clip to what was left of his umbilical cord as the two other tentacles cleaned off the fluid from his bum and uncircumcised penis. It unwrapped a large white diaper and placed it under him butt where it proceeded to strap it onto the newborn. It stamped a barcode onto the front of his diaper with his number above it as it removed the feeding tentacle from his mouth and replaced it with a large pacifier.

A bassinet that was just Dennis' size floated into the room - having been notified by the central computer to do so - where the Nursing Bot placed him in as he fell back asleep. The pod Dennis was just born from began to refill with fluid, the sensitive artificial tissue that broke having already reformed, for the next unborn baby to incubate. The bassinet then floated away to…
1331.title: Nursery Planet Clononinon

choices: "Mommy" plays with him the next morning.
He is introduced to the other babies the next morning.
13311.content:
Dennis dreamt of bright, brilliant colors. They shimmered in his mind’s eye with the twinkling of a thousand diamond stars. His dreams were a kaleidoscope; mesmerizing, soothing. There were no troubles here, no worries, no nightmares. All was as it should be. Perfect comfort, perfect warmth, perfect everything.

Dennis opened his eyes and gave a yawn. His tongue absent mindedly probed his teeth for the first time, his lungs tickling from the sensation of breathing. As newly activated neurons in his brain began firing away at the new sensation of sight. Dennis began to remember the various things he should know, like speaking modern English, basic math and the limitations expected from the human body. Installed in the incubation pods that the babies were made from was a bio-mechanical system that uploaded this information into the human's unconscious mind, not unlike instincts.

The large bassinet that carried the newborn led him to a large room filled with other babies his age as well. He could not see much from his bed, but he could see the walls painted in babyish pastel colors, with cartoon bear cubs and kittens all wearing diapers themselves wearing diapers, playing ball with one another, among many other illustrations meant to appeal to the baby's imagination and humor them.

He heard crying a small-talk from people he could not see. He saw similar bassinets lined up next to him that he knew housed other babies as the blankets in them moved with the babies. The light from the ceiling was blocked as a robot stopped infront of him.

"Hello Dennis. I will be your Nursing Unit for the duration of your stay here, but you can call me 'Mommy'," the robot said.

"M...Mommy?" Dennis said. His throat tingled as he spoke for the first time.

"That's right Dennis," the robot said in a babyish voice.

The Nursing Unit had a fairly humanoid physiology, with a smiling face with its eyes and mouth having blue lights. Its body was clearly mechanical, its hip size and synthetic hair done up showing that it is meant to be seen as female, but with the exception of its chest, which looked similar to that of actual, bare-human breasts. Chrome-synthesoid metal: artificial organic substance synthesised for use of replicating flesh for prosthetic limbs and robotics Dennis realized, the information surfacing into his conscious mind as it should have. Scanning eyes: registering barcode to verify ownership of baby to Nursing Unit.

"Uh-oh, it looks like somebody had an accident," the robot said as it put a hand onto his diaper. Dennis just then realized that she was right. He peed himself on his way to the nursery.

She reached down and picked the baby up in her arms, her robot strength being able to bear his weight. She held up his head against her shoulder - his neck muscles still getting the hand of being used - as she took him over to a changing table. He got a better look at the room he was in showing that the room was divided into different sections. The section he was in was lined up, row to row with identical nursing units constantly, breastfeeding, burping, changing, and rocking the babies to sleep. Unlike Dennis, the babies were wearing clothes, the girls wearing uniform pink and the boys in uniform blue, in various babyish clothes, from onsies to rompers, dresses, short-tails and so on. Some of them even had hair, the bald ones indicating that they were brand new like him. On the other side of the room there were a group of older babies, playing with toys in a large, colorful daycare center. being managed by a group of Nursing Units.

Mommy laid him down on his back on what he could only assume was the changing table as the robot undid the tapes on his diaper and opened his diaper up, his wet groin cooling in the exposed air. Penis: male sex organ for excretion of urine and insemination of offspring through female vagina, the information surface. Diaper: disposable undergarment placed upon you offspring and incontinent humans for sanitation. Baby: offspring of veritable young age. Nursing Unit: robotic parental unit programmed for child-rearing.

"W-will... it s-stop?" Dennis asked as he struggled to find the words through his unconscious.

"Don't worry, sweety. Baby boys don't have to worry about others seeing their pee-pee," Mommy said as she wiped his butt with baby-wipes.

"N-no..." as he tried to find the correct way of telling her about the cold, hard facts surfacing in his head. The nursing unit brought up another diaper - this one without a barcode - and slipped it under him, taping it shut. She reached down under the changing table when she got his clean diaper and brought up what looked like a baby-blue t-shirt and placed it over his head. The t-shirt seemed bigger than him until she snapped the bottom of the shirt below his diaper, revealing it to be a baby-blue onsie.

"Maybe you're just hungry," said Mommy as she picked him up. "Drink up baby" as she brought his head up to one of her flesh-like breasts. Without even thinking, his sensitive lips latched onto the robot's nipple, a nutritional formula not unlike breast-milk squirting into his mouth. It was sweet and warm and it calmed his nerves and filled his tummy. He greedily drunk from her, not realizing how hungry he was as a small stream of milk leaking onto his chin as Mommy walked back to his empty bassinet.

Her breast was now empty but he still kept sucking, now soothed by the sucking motions as he started to become drowsy. The nipple was forcibly removed from his mouth with a pop as she laid him back

"Mu...m-muh," Dennis muttered, trying to say Mommy as his instincts overrode his still developing mind, wanting to keep sucking. Mommy took the pacifier had in his mouth when he first came in and placed it back into his mouth, calming the baby down.

"It's okay Dennis, Mommy's here." As he faded out of of consciousness, his first day of life coming to an end as his sight slowly faded.

"Happy Birthday."

133112.content:
Dennis woke from a long night's sleep, his brain having rested itself from the excitement earlier, properly processing the information that surfaced from his unconscious. He kicks his legs and freed his arms from his blanket as he resumed sucking on the pacifier from the other night, feeling the clammy sensations in his diaper, having wet it repeatedly throughout the night. The room around his crib seemed less bright than it was the day before, his eyes having adjusted accordingly as his genes were programmed.

"Aw, look who's awake," said Mommy, the robot nurse moving the blanket out of the way as she picked the baby up. "I bet your hungry for your num-nums after your nap. Yes you are."

The nurse led Dennis' head to her breast as Dennis began to sample the formula, enjoying its sweet taste as it filled his tummy. As he fed, he felt the clammy sensation in his diaper area grow warm as he peed, content.

"Baby Dennis loves his mommy's breakfast, doesn't he?" She said as he finished the last of his milk. She placed Dennis over her shoulder, burping him as she brought him to a changing table. As she proceeded to clean and change him, she cooed to him how he should be excited about his first day of life and all of the friends he would make in his Kindergarten.

Kindergarten? He asked himself.

Kindergarten, the programmed information told him, was the term used for a group of Clononinon babies - like a pride of lions or a school of fish. With his kindergarten, he will exercise his natural critical-thinking skills and capacity for social contact (as the social animal that he was) and develop properly until he passed the proper prerequisites of human adulthood, where he would then leave Clononinon as a fully capable human adult.

When Mommy finished changing him, she picked him up and placed him in a high-tech seat-like device, strapping him in using a seat belt and pushing it forward by a handle, the seat hovering with the same technology as the bassinet that delivered him.

They left the massive room, being strolled through a hallway with other nurses and strolling babies like cars driving along a freeway. Eventually they came to a stop in front of a door labeled:

Facility B123.AD

Kindergarten Room 04329856

"Busy Bee Kindergarten"


"You ready to be a busy bee?" Asked Mommy.

Dennis didn't answer, trying to recall in his pre-programmed brain what a "bee" was, before the door slid open, allowing them to enter.

The room was not as massive as the other, but Dennis could not help but stare in amazement. The floor was made of a pure-white carpet, designed to be soft and cozy enough for babies to crawl across.

On the ceiling floated large orbs in varying pastel colors like balloons, with pretty flowers and a landscape painted along the walls. Various changing tables and boxes full of toys crowded along the walls, kept clean and organized. Half of the room was separated by a fence where a bunch of nursing units were crowding along it, facing the other direction. One of the nursing units, one with green eyes, a ponytail and breasts twice the size of Mommy, noticed them.

"Oh look," the nursing unit pointed, getting the attention of the other units. "We have a new bee in the hive."

All of the nursing units suddenly ran over to Mommy and Dennis, where the units then proceeded to coo and laugh over Dennis. The baby boy was overwhelmed by the nursing units as they pinched his "whittle" toes and cooed over just how "adorable" he was. Dennis did not like the attention, and did not know whether to tell them to back off or cry as expected from a baby. He felt a pressure in his body tighten before it suddenly released into his diaper, warming him with fresh pee.

"Okay, okay girls. Lets not overexcite my baby," said Mommy, like it was rehearsed by an over-zealous actor. "Dennis wants be a bee."

"He does?" Said a yellow-eyed, blonde-haired unit cooing at him. "Is that what you want? Do you want to be a busy bee?"

Dennis tried to say I guess so, but it came out as a few babyish grunts.

One of the units went to open the gate across the room as Mommy strolled them there. Mommy unbuckled the seatbelt and lifted Dennis out of his seat, one of the other units putting the chair away. Mommy placed Dennis into the middle of the play area.

"Everyone, hey, everyone," One of the nursing units, called out, getting the attention of the other babies. "Meet the new busy bee Dennis. He's brand new, so I hope you can help him feel welcome."

The other babies varying in appearance. There were male and female babies of varying ages, the newer ones bald and completely naked except for their diapers, while the older ones has hair of varying lengths and styles, with baby clothes depending on the individual.
133112.title: A Kindergarten of Babies.

1331121.content:
Mommy let go of Dennis as she walked back behind the fence and closed it, content to watch her baby occupy her time watching her baby from a short distance. He was surprised he was sitting up right, his body and muscles having adjusted since yesterday.

There were 6 older kids crowding around the left corner. A red-headed, freckled boy in a pair of overalls struggled to walk, toddling away from a blonde baby in a pink sundress that was waddling after her in a circle in a game of tag. Two girls were playing with a large set of LEGOs big enough for them to crawl over. One with short black hair wearing a pink onsie over her clearly showing diaper, the other with blonde hair tied in pigtails wearing a pink t-shirt, her pinkish-diaper exposed. The green-eyed nursing unit from before was sitting on her knees against the wall, content as her two babies were feeding from her engorged breasts. They were twins, a boy and a girl. The boy suckling on the left breast was in a blue onsie with brown hair, while the girl on the right had her long brown hair loose and wore a pink dress that did nothing to hide her diaper. The girl briefly stopped drinking as the seat of her diaper suddenly puffed out, the girl making hushed, pushing grunts before she went back to her feeding.

Intrigued by the older babies, Dennis decided that he would like to play with them, thinking that they would understand him. He carefully moved his knees and hands in sink, steadily learning to crawl for the first time. As he got the hang of it, he felt a pressure like before, but it was much stronger than when he had to make a pee. The powerful sensation built and built, the discomfort moving through his body.

"You're the new kid right?"

It was the red-head in overalls. He got bored of the game of tag he had with the blonde and decided he needed to rest, still not having gotten used to walking. He sat down in front of Dennis, the diaper beneath his overalls cushioning his butt as did so with a muffled crinkling noise beneath his overalls.

"My name is Lewis. I'm the biggest kid in Busy Bee. What was your name again?"

Dennis, forgetting the pressure in his body, flexed his tongue to speak.

"D...D...De-ennis," he spoke.

"Hi Dennis, you want to play?"

"You don't want to play with him," said the blonde girl from before, having sat down with Lewis. "He's just a baby. He probably just wants to lay around and go potty in his pants."

"You went potty in your diaper Jackie," said Lewis, pointing at the big yellow patch staining the pony illustrations on her diaper.

"P-Peeing doesn't count," said Jackie. Suddenly she pointed at Dennis. "Eew, he just pooped!"

It was true. Dennis's diaper puffed out, having just made his first bowel movement. He did not notice it until it was brought to his attention, and he did not like it. Instinctively, Dennis wanted to cry, wanting to Mommy to make the icky feeling go away. Lewis crawled toward him and whispered in his ear.

"Don't worry, I won't tell anyone."

This made Dennis feel better as his tears receded.

"Come on. Some of the best toys are free," as Lewis crawled on his hands and knees over to the toy chest. Chloe followed.
1331121.title: The Big Babies

choices: See what Eve and her brother are up to.
13311211.content:
Dennis wanted to play with his new friends, but tears leaked from his eyes anyway, the gross mess in the seat of his diaper burning against his still-sensitive skin. The load in his diaper spread across his butt when he moved as the floodgates let loose, Dennis sobbing in full effect.

"Aw, are you okay sweety?" Asked Mommy, who came to see what was wrong with her baby. She placed a hand on his diaper. "Don't worry, baby boy. Mommy will make it all better."

Mommy picked the boy up, her arm under his diaper butt and spreading the poop further, as she placed him on his back on one of the changing tables in the room. She placed a pacifier in Dennis, who then began to suck on the pacifier, calming him down.

"Hey."

Dennis turned his head. On the changing table next to him laid the twin girl from before, her nursing unit was wiping her down as she was about to replace her diaper.

"You're the new baby, right?"

"D-Dennis," he responded, having gotten used to saying his name.

"I'm Eve, but my friends call me Eevee. Where you born yesterday? You look like you were born yesterday. My brother and I were born a looooooooooooong time ago. Mommy says that my brother and I are going to walk any day now, and then we'll get potty training and then we can leave and join the rest of the grown ups. Do you have any brothers? Sisters? Kitty cats? I've never seen a real kitten but someday I might!"

"Sweety, remember when we talked about?"

"...to not talk so fast?"

"That's right whittle Eevee," said the nursing unit as she finished strapping on the girl's new diaper. "Dennis is just a baby. You got to be gentle with him."

"Okay mommy."

Dennis was silently grateful for the nursing unit. Eve talked a mile a minute, and Dennis was not sure if he could handle that. The nursing unit blew a raspberry over Eve's bellybutton, causing the baby girl to laugh incessantly, kicking her legs around, before the nursing unit smoothed her babyish dress out and picking her up.

"Bye Dennis," said Eve over her nursing unit's shoulder as she was taken back to the play area.
13311211.title: Dennis needs a change now!

1332.content:
The flying city was peaceful that day. The wind was calm, the leaves in the trees were brushing by and the building glowed with neon lights of every color you could ever like.

It's the year 3,013. Technology on Earth became the pinnacle of the galaxy and the earth has found a level of peace after all f these centuries.

This is the flying Olympia City. In this city, the citizens live in peace as the clouds blanket the sky like a comforting roof.

Bia was was having her daily stroll out on Glaucus Road, a copy of "Dewitched" in her hands. She had a pair of turquoise boots that made a soft shifting noise with every step. She wore a matching top and had black bands to tie her turquoise dyed hair into two matching pony-tales. Instead of a matching bottom, she wore a white disposable diaper. For a few decades, everybody in Olympia City and even in a few neighboring cities has been using diaper instead of plumbing. No-one really bothered bringing it up that much, but some people made their theories. Some believe it to be a fashion statement that stuck (kind of like neck-ties or those colored plastic shoes with the holes in them). Others believe that it operates as a way to power the city. Chuck them into the incinerator to power the flying city. Quick, clean and efficient.

Who populates Olympia City?
